message.name: ERR_SUBGOAL_FV_REFERENCE_EXISTS
message.locale: A sub goal with the reference specified already exists. Sub goal reference must be unique.

message.name: ERR_SUBGOAL_FV_NAME_BLANK
message.locale: The name must not be blank.

message.name: ERR_SUBGOAL_FV_NAME_EXISTS
message.locale: A sub goal with the name specified already exists. Sub goal name must be unique.

message.name: ERR_SUBGOAL_ALREADY_CANCELED
message.locale: This sub goal has already been cancelled.
This sub goal has already been canceled.

message.name: ERR_SUBGOAL_CANCELED
message.locale: This sub goal is cancelled and cannot be modified.
This sub goal is canceled and cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_SUBGOAL_XFV_PLAN_ITEM_EXISTS
message.locale: The plan item %1s has already been added to this sub goal.

message.name: ERR_SUBGOAL_XFV_CONTRACTTEXT_EXISTS_FOR_LANGUAGE
message.locale: Contract text already exists for this language code.

message.name: ERR_SUBGOAL_XFV_OUTCOME_EXISTS
message.locale: The outcome %1s has already been added to this sub goal.

message.name: ERR_SUBGOAL_TEMPLATES_EXIST
message.locale: The sub goal cannot be cancelled as there are existing templates based on it.
The sub goal cannot be canceled as there are existing templates based on it.

message.name: ERR_SUBGOAL_FV_TYPE_BLANK
message.locale: The sub goal type must not be blank.

message.name: ERR_SUBGOAL_XRV_TEMPLATES_EXIST
message.locale: The sub goal cannot be cancelled as there are existing templates based on it.
The sub goal cannot be canceled as there are existing templates based on it.

message.name: ERR_SUBGOAL_XRV_ASSIGNED_TO_GOAL
message.locale: This sub goal is assigned to at least one goal and cannot be cancelled.
This sub goal is assigned to at least one goal and cannot be canceled.

message.name: ERR_SUBGOAL_XRV_PLANTEMPLATEPLAN_ITEM_ASSIGNED_TO_PLANTEMPLATE
message.locale: This plan item cannot be removed from this sub goal. There is an existing plan template plan item based on this plan item and assigned to a plan template sub goal based on this sub goal.
